thread.title: Marco Rubio Latest to Speak Out on Prescription Drug Prices
thread.title_full: Marco Rubio Latest to Speak Out on Prescription Drug Prices - WSJ

author: Joseph Walker
title: Marco Rubio Latest to Speak Out on Prescription Drug Prices
text:
U.S. Senator Marco Rubio (R-Fla.) became the latest presidential candidate to speak out on prescription drug prices, saying that some pharmaceutical companies are engaging in “pure profiteering” and that high prices threaten to “bankrupt our system.”
At a campaign event in New Hampshire last week, a member of the audience asked Sen. Rubio to characterize his “free-market solution” to bringing down the high-cost of lifesaving... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
